channel.title: json on MagMax's blog
channel.description: Recent content in json on MagMax's blog

item.title: XML vs JSON (en)
item.description: Lately I am seeing lots of comparatives between JSON and XML. I do not want to be less than them, so I investigated a little to enter in this kind of comparatives. Sadly, I realized that they are not comparable. To compare XML with JSON is just like compare an OpenOffice document with a text file. They are completely different things. A JSON file is a set of grouped data. Nothing more.
